name: My New Pet?
description: Have you ever read a fan fiction that was so bad it was good? So bad, that it inspired you to make a game based off of it? No? Well, in my case, the answer was "YES." Imagine Jimin from BTS... Being a dog. Thus, My New Pet? came into being! Featuring seven different endings, there's bound to be re-play value! To be honest, I do not remember the title of the absolutely powerful fan fiction that inspired my work, but its memory lives on in the form of this game. This game was made as a joke, is a joke, and forever will be a joke. Don't take it personally if you are a BTS or Jimin fan. And lastly, if this game has gotten even as much as a smirk from you in response to it, then I have done my duty.
